channel.title: THE OLD-TIME RADIO HOUR
channel.description: Popular & rare vintage radio programs with brief commentary. Posted weekly.
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2010 Justeen Ward. All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:summary: Popular and rare vintage radio programs with brief commentary. Posted weekly.
channel.itunes:author: Justeen Ward
